title: Re-absorbing Islam, The Hole in the Culture where Religion Used to Be. Jan 7 2022 Q/A
description:
Shaking things up today. If you want to join the discussion find your way into the room. https://discord.gg/YSXw5xR5

0:00:05  Intro 
0:08:40  A prayer for Bradley (r.i.p.)  
0:10:30  What’re similarities and differences between reformation and deconstruction?
0:19:25  When in 2022 will PVK do the European Tour?
0:21:10  What does the either/or that Christ requires and the promised salvation means (Mt 12:30)?
0:38:50 Ad: Kalepa and John psychedelics conversation on Rando’s United
0:40:40  What’re PVK’s thoughts on David Benner, author?
0:42:00  Is it ok to go into VR while waiting for Jesus’ return?
0:42:10  Can there be a live reaction video to ecumenical promo clip (Chad for Pope)? 
0:42:45  Why shouldn’t psychological evidence of Brockman be taken as supporting projection theory?
0:44:20  Which of the main Christian churches is suitable to incorporate Islam?
1:22:30  What type of hole is the “hole in culture left by Church?”
2:00:15  Closing remarks / End of transmission
